description:
Hello! This is a cozy, colorful, beautifully furnished 2 bedroom in Clinton Hill neighborhood. Entire apartment, terrific location in the heart of it all!

Two full sized beds with great mattresses and lots of storage. Excellent light in both bedrooms; one north-facing, one south.

Wifi, TV- Netflix, Hulu, and HBO Go.

Large, fully stocked chef-friendly kitchen.

Everything you could want to make you feel at home!
name: Cozy, colorful Clinton Hill Brownstone 2-bed
